- Want to talk about it? - No!
Uh, okay, I don't mean to rush you, but your guests have started to arrive.
translation.ja: お客さんが集まってる

translation.en: I don't care!
Come on, open up. It's only me.
It's fricking open.
- What is going on here? -
I didn't want the ice sculptures. I didn't…
translation.ja: 氷の彫刻なんて 置きたくなかった

translation.en: I didn't want the gold- leaf cake, and why can't he just wear a tuxedo?
translation.ja: 金箔(きんぱく)のケーキも嫌 タキシードじゃダメなの？

translation.en: Okay, Dr. Priya, time for a little chat.
translation.ja: プリヤ先生 話しましょ

translation.en: He won't even tell me what his big surprise is.
translation.ja: サプライズの中身も不明

translation.en: Then it wouldn't be a surprise, would it?
translation.ja: 話したら意味ないでしょ

translation.en: I don't think this is about cakes or ice sculptures or surprises.
translation.ja: 問題はケーキや 彫刻じゃないと思う

translation.en: - I think this is about you. - How is this possibly about me?
translation.ja: あなたよ なんで私が？

translation.en: For some reason, I think this whole seven lifetimes thing has you kind of freaked out.
translation.ja: “７つの生涯”ってやつに おびえてる

translation.en: It just got me thinking.
Every generation in our family has done this for centuries.
translation.ja: 何世代も 家族が続けてきた伝統を

translation.en: What if I'm the first one to screw it up?
You don't have to worry. I already screwed it up.
But I'm the first one to marry someone who isn't Indian.
translation.ja: 私の相手はインド人じゃない

translation.en: Is that what this is about? 'Cause Nick is way more Indian than we are.
translation.ja: 彼は私たちより インド人らしいわ

translation.en: Are you seriously gonna say that to me? How's that supposed to make me feel…
translation.ja: 今 そんなこと言う？ 私の気持ちを…

translation.en: I know. Listen, listen, listen.
- - Nick is crazy about you.
translation.ja: ニックはあなたに夢中

translation.en: Okay? I mean, otherwise he wouldn't be dressed the way he is.
translation.ja: だから あんな服を着てるの

translation.en: - How's he dressed? - Doesn't matter.
translation.ja: 服？ 忘れて とにかく彼には愛がある

translation.en: What matters is that he loves you.
translation.ja: 忘れて とにかく彼には愛がある

translation.en: And Mom and Dad love him.
Or at least, they will learn to.
The only question that remains is, do you?
translation.ja: あとは あなたよ 彼を愛してる？

translation.en: But I'm scared.
We're all scared.
If you don't marry Nick today, you're gonna regret it for the rest of your life.
translation.ja: でも彼と結婚しなければ 一生 後悔する

translation.en: Pri, you have a chance to live your life the way you want to.
translation.ja: 自分の人生を 生きるチャンスよ

translation.en: So just tune out the noise.
Listen to your heart.
Let your love be greater than your fear.
translation.ja: 愛の力で恐怖に打ち勝って

translation.en: That's beautiful, Ash.
- Did you come up with that yourself? - Yep.
translation.ja: 自分で考えた？ ええ

translation.en: No.
It was someone a little bit smarter than me.
translation.ja: 私より賢い人の言葉よ

translation.en: We need to get you into makeup. Now.
- Really? - Yes, really. You should see your face.
translation.ja: そう？ 鏡を見てみてよ

translation.en: Priya! Thank God! Quickly, let's get you ready and dressed.
translation.ja: プリヤ よかった　早く支度なさい

translation.en: - Have you been drinking? - No.
Yes. Get her some coffee.
Wait, wait, no. Let's get you dressed.
There's something I need to do first.
- Where you going? - Don't worry, I'll be back.
Hai raam! I can smell the Pinot Grigio on you.
- I know. I was 12 years old. - Oh my God.
And so, I'm alone with this person who's driving me crazy.
translation.ja: 一緒にいたのは変なヤツで―

translation.en: I had to walk home. Can you imagine that?
- And I decided to keep it. - Ravi?
translation.ja: 頑張ったよ ラヴィ

translation.en: - Asha. What're you doing here? - I was an idiot. I owe you an apology.
translation.ja: どうした？ 私がバカだった　謝りたいの

translation.en: Asha, you don't have to--
I never had a chance to thank you. For going along with my crazy scheme.
translation.ja: お礼も言えてない 計画に乗ってくれた

translation.en: For teaching me how to drop beats and turn tables.
translation.ja: ビートの響かせ方も 教えてくれたし

translation.en: For donating 50 years' worth of Indian takeout to my work.
translation.ja: 料理50年分の 寄付もしてくれた

translation.en: I know it came from your heart.
Because everything you do comes from your heart.
translation.ja: あなたは いつも優しい

translation.en: And I was wrong to say you didn't believe in me.
I'm sorry.
Ash…
Um, Ravi, who is this?
Doesn't matter.
What matters is this is a great guy, you know?
translation.ja: とにかく 彼はいい人よ

translation.en: He's brilliant. He's kind. He's a true original.
translation.ja: ステキで親切で唯一無二なの

translation.en: He might seem like a bit of a slacker at first.
translation.ja: 怠け者に見えるでしょ

translation.en: I thought so too.
And you should never play him at Bananagrams. Ever.
translation.ja: しかも バナナグラムでムキになる

translation.en: As you get to know him, he grows on you.
translation.ja: でも 彼を知るにつれて

translation.en: And if you're not too blind,
you'll find he's the kind of guy you want cheering you on.
translation.ja: ずっと応援してほしいって

translation.en: Always.
Ash.
- Asha. - Go.
- Go! - Asha!
It's not what you think!
Asha. Asha, wait!
- Everything's gonna be fine. - Why do you keep saying that?
translation.ja: 落ち着くんだ まだ言うの？

translation.en: Why do you keep telling me to calm down. This is serious.
translation.ja: 私に言わないでってば

translation.en: People are listening.
- Why are we here? - Thank God you're here.
Great. Now we need the groom.
Where's Nick?
- You haven't seen him? - No. Why?
This is a disaster!
If this is his surprise, this is not funny.
This white guy is taking Indian Standard Time to a new level.
How could he just disappear?
- I did see him before and he-- - He what?
He was asking for help.
- You didn't help him? - I was looking for you!
- God, our daughters will never marry! - Ma. Come on.
translation.ja: また破談？ ママ よして

translation.en: Is that an elephant?
Hai Bhagwan.
Oh. My. God.
Welcome, Spice Girls!
Priya.
You are a dead onion.
With you, I'm a thin banana.
translation.ja: 〈君といると〉 〈僕はすごくシワヨセだ〉

translation.en: - Did I… I said… - No.
translation.ja: ちゃんと言えた？ いいえ

translation.en: - No? - No.
My God, I'm so sorry I was so late.
I know you didn't want a whole thing, and I did a whole thing.
translation.ja: こんなの 君は望んでなかった

translation.en: It was perfect.
I love you so much.
Come on, let's get you married!
Congratulations, guys. Whoo!
And congratulations to my mom and dad too, for staying out of their way.
translation.ja: 両親にもお祝いを ２人への干渉は卒業ね

translation.en: - Mostly. - Little bit.
One thing that I have learned about love…
translation.ja: 愛について 学んだことがあります

translation.en: is that it's a lot like moving to a new country.
Trying to build something where nothing existed before.
translation.ja: 何もなかった所に 一から築いていくの

translation.en: It's hanging on and letting go.
translation.ja: 時に― 大切に守り 時に手放す

translation.en: It's messy, it's beautiful,
translation.ja: 混乱もあるけど美しい

translation.en: like any giant leap of faith.
translation.ja: 信じるとは そういうこと

translation.en: So congratulations to the two of you for taking that leap.
translation.ja: ２人の門出にお祝いを これからも ずっと信じ合ってね

translation.en: May you take many more. I love you.
translation.ja: これからも ずっと信じ合ってね 大好きよ

translation.en: - Cheers to Nick and Priya! - Cheers!
translation.ja: ニックとプリヤに乾杯！

translation.en: Cheers.
Thank you.
Aw! You're welcome.  I love you guys.
translation.ja: いいのよ　愛してる

translation.en: Thank you, Ash.
You could get married too. - I love you. - Mom!
And thank you to everyone who celebrated with us today.
translation.ja: 一緒に祝ってくれる皆さんに 感謝します

translation.en: But we have a surprise for you.
I am honored to invite
our own DJ Spellbound!
That's Ravi!
Look, Asha, that's Ravi.
You have to say something to them.
Stop the music! Stop the music!
What in God's name is going on? Pinky, please sit down.
translation.ja: ピンキー 座ってくれ

translation.en: Suneeta, Vijay, it is my duty to tell you that this boy is a fraud.
translation.ja: スニータ ヴィジャイ この青年はウソつきよ

translation.en: - Pinky, it's okay. - I tried to warn you.
translation.ja: いいんだ 私は忠告を…

translation.en: No, no, no. Pinky, enough.
Enough.
You need to let this go.
Maybe it's time we learn something from our kids and leave the shame behind.
translation.ja: 子供たちから学びましょう 恥は過去にとどめるの

translation.en: Pinky, it's over. Come.
translation.ja: ピンキー 席に戻って

translation.en: Sorry. She's a little drunk.
translation.ja: 失礼　お酒のせいですね

translation.en: Um, if I may, uh…
Pinky Auntie's right.
I haven't been honest about who I am for a very, very long time.
translation.ja: 俺はずっと 自分を偽ってきました

translation.en: It's okay, Ravi.
Thank you, Uncle, but I'm sorry, um…
translation.ja: 感謝します　でも言わせて

translation.en: Not for me. For the people I've hurt.
translation.ja: 俺は人を傷つけました

translation.en: Especially you, Asha.
And to you, Nick and Priya.
translation.ja: ニックとプリヤ 晴れの席で申し訳ないけど

translation.en: I, uh, know a wedding isn't the place for this, but I, um…
translation.ja: ニックとプリヤ 晴れの席で申し訳ないけど ひと言…

translation.en: - Dad, just-- - Please.
- What are you doing? - Let me speak. Let me speak.
translation.ja: 何？ 私に話をさせてくれ

translation.en: Yes. Ravi did not graduate from MIT. He does not have a start- up.
translation.ja: 確かに― 息子はＭＩＴを卒業してない 起業家でもない

translation.en: - Is there a point? What are you doing? - Yes.
The point is that it doesn't matter.
translation.ja: だが そうであっても

translation.en: I, we…
are very proud that you're our son.
Thanks, Dad.
Okay, enough.
Asha, I'm sorry I wasn't more honest with you.
translation.ja: アーシャ 隠してて悪かった

translation.en: Reality is, I've never had truer feelings than when I was pretending to date you.
translation.ja: 君の恋人を演じた時が 一番 素直でいられたよ

translation.en: I wasn't even really pretending.
Asha, you're gonna change the world.
That beautiful mind and that big heart.
I just hope there's room for me in it. Someday.
translation.ja: いつか 俺の居場所もできるといい

translation.en: What about her?
Me?
That's Pihu. Um, she's my cousin.
translation.ja: ピーフーは いとこだよ

translation.en: Say hi, Pihu.
Come here.
Go.
Whoo! Yay!  Yes!
- Yeah! - Finally!
My name is Asha Maurya.
translation.ja: 私はアーシャ･マウリヤ

translation.en: And I have a joyous appetite for life.
translation.ja: ハングリーに生きています

translation.en: I am a natural in the kitchen.
And yearn to have a family to feed.
translation.ja: 憧れは家族に食べさせること

translation.en: I save the world by day.
But live a quiet, traditional life by night.
translation.ja: 夜は古風に 静かな時間を過ごす

translation.en: At heart, I'm just a simple girl whose hobbies include fine dining
translation.ja: 私は平凡な女子 趣味はグルメと 家でくつろぐこと

translation.en: and relaxing at home.
translation.ja: 趣味はグルメと 家でくつろぐこと

translation.en: Seeking my Indian Prince Charming with a freelance job and a heart of gold.
translation.ja: 求む フリーランスで 優しいインド系の王子様

translation.en: I love weddings and dream of having a grand one of my own someday.
translation.ja: 結婚式が大好きで いつか盛大に 挙式するのが夢です

translation.en: Maybe.
I think.
